LanguageData.SCBlackHorse.label: black horse
LanguageData.SCBlackHorse.description: A strong, fast horse. Makes a formidable foe in combat and an excellent companion on the range.
LanguageData.SCBlackHorse.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCBlackHorse.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.SCBlackHorse.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.SCPalomino.label: palomino
LanguageData.SCPalomino.description: An incredibly beautiful horse which is slightly faster than an average horse. Kept by more wealthy colonies as a show item. Not exceptionally helpful on long voyages and eats a lot.
LanguageData.SCPalomino.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCPalomino.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.SCPalomino.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.SCQuarterHorse.label: quarter horse
LanguageData.SCQuarterHorse.description: A common horse. Makes a good companion for crossing large swaths of land. Can survive off sparse amounts of food.
LanguageData.SCQuarterHorse.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCQuarterHorse.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.SCQuarterHorse.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
LanguageData.SCWhiteHorse.label: white horse
LanguageData.SCWhiteHorse.description: The fastest horse in the rim. Valued for its quick nature and its beautiful looks.
LanguageData.SCWhiteHorse.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.SCWhiteHorse.tools.left_hoof.label: left hoof
LanguageData.SCWhiteHorse.tools.right_hoof.label: right hoof
